articles.title: REPEAT: Award-winning Investigative News Program W5 Airs Part 2 of 3-part Television Series on Alleged Stock Market Manipulation of Quantum Biopharma Involving Two of Canada’s Largest Banks, CIBC and RBC
articles.summary: Quantum BioPharma announced that CTV News' investigative program W5 aired Part 2 of a three-part series on alleged stock market manipulation involving Quantum Biopharma and two major Canadian banks, CIBC and RBC. The series highlights a USD $700 million lawsuit alleging illegal stock spoofing to manipulate Quantum Biopharma's stock price. The company aims to raise awareness about this illegal practice and its impact on retail investors and shareholders.

articles.title: ORA Developers Group anuncia su debut en el LPS Shanghái, con lo que refuerza su presencia mundial de 45.000 millones de dólares
articles.summary: ORA Developers, líder mundial en desarrollos inmobiliarios y destinos de estilo de vida visionarios, anuncia su debut en el Luxury Property Showcase (LPS) en Shanghái, marcando un hito en su expansión internacional. Presenta una colección selecta de desarrollos costeros emblemáticos en Emiratos Árabes Unidos, Chipre y el Caribe, con una cartera valorada en más de 45.000 millones de dólares. La estrategia de ORA se centra en comunidades de diseño excepcional, calidad y estabilidad financiera, ofreciendo valor de inversión y opciones geopolíticas a sus clientes.

Quedo atento a su respuesta.

Saludos cordiales,
outreach_templates.linkedin_message: Hola Tamer, felicidades por el debut de ORA Developers en LPS Shanghái. Me encantaría conectar para explorar oportunidades de colaboración.

outreach_templates.email_body:

Quedo a la espera de su amable respuesta.

Atentamente,
outreach_templates.linkedin_message: Hola Tarek, vi el comunicado de prensa de ORA Developers y me gustaría conectar para conversar sobre posibles colaboraciones.

articles.title: ORA Developers Group Umumkan Penampilan Sulung di LPS Shanghai, Mengukuhkan Jejak Global Bernilai AS$45 Bilion
articles.summary: ORA Developers, a global leader in innovative real estate development and exclusive lifestyle destinations, announced its debut at the Luxury Property Showcase (LPS) Shanghai. The company will showcase its exclusive coastal developments in prestigious locations including UAE, Cyprus, and the Caribbean, highlighting a portfolio valued at over US$45 billion. This participation marks a strategic step in ORA's global expansion and engagement with key international investors seeking premium assets. ORA's portfolio includes major projects such as Bayn in UAE, Ayia Napa Marina in Cyprus, and ultra-luxury properties in Grenada, offering unique investment and lifestyle opportunities.

articles.title: Glossy Pop Newsletter: Merit leans into humor with its ‘The Five Minute Face Off’ campaign
articles.summary: Merit, a 5-year-old beauty brand, launched its first evergreen brand campaign titled 'The Five Minute Faceoff,' starring former SNL stars Ego Nwodim and Heidi Gardner. The campaign uses humor to address the pressures women face daily and aims to increase brand awareness and improve brand sentiment without promoting a specific product. The campaign debuted on social media platforms and has received positive engagement and high watch-through rates.

articles.title: Luxury Briefing: Sentaler goes international as luxury outerwear demand intensifies
articles.summary: Sentaler, a Canadian luxury alpaca outerwear brand, is expanding internationally with its first U.S. boutique on Madison Avenue amid strong demand for luxury outerwear. The brand reports 50% year-over-year growth in the U.S. and is extending its retail presence with seasonal boutiques and trunk shows. Sentaler's growth aligns with shifting holiday shopping behaviors favoring timeless, aspirational gifts. The brand's celebrity endorsements have been organic, and it targets loyal customers with private appointments. The Madison Avenue boutique features a new 'cherry lacquer' motif, symbolizing growth and tapping into current trends.

articles.title: Molson Coors says ‘Just Bring the Beer’ in bid to millennials, Gen Z
articles.summary: Molson Coors launched the 'Just Bring the Beer' campaign targeting millennials and Gen Z, positioning beer as a simple, affordable option for holiday gatherings. The campaign highlights multiple Molson Coors brands and is piloted in select U.S. cities with billboards, retail activations, social media, and creator partnerships. It reflects younger consumers' preference for experiences over traditional gifts and runs through the end of the year.

articles.title: Bitget es coanfitrión de “SENSES”, una experiencia audiovisual en Londres que fortalece la participación de la UEX en el Reino Unido
articles.summary: Bitget, la bolsa universal (UEX) más grande del mundo, coorganizó un evento audiovisual inmersivo llamado SENSES en Londres el 28 de noviembre de 2025. El evento exclusivo reunió a fundadores, inversores, operadores VIP y personas influyentes para fomentar conversaciones significativas y asociaciones orgánicas en el ecosistema Web3 del Reino Unido. Esta activación forma parte del compromiso continuo de Bitget con el mercado del Reino Unido, incluyendo colaboraciones con OffChain, la comunidad artística local y organizaciones académicas como la Universidad de Bristol y la London School of Economics.

articles.title: Anthem and Chartier Partner to Build Life-Sized Gingerbread House at Calgary’s Holiday Wonder Event
articles.summary: Anthem Properties and Chartier bakery have partnered to build a life-sized gingerbread house as the centerpiece of Calgary's Holiday Wonder event at the BMO Centre from November 27 to January 3. articles.summary: Cellectis, a clinical-stage biotechnology company, will hold a webinar on December 4, 2025, to present promising clinical data for lasmé-cel in relapsed/refractory B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia, discuss the phase 2 pivotal trial design, registration pathway, and commercial potential. The webinar will also cover updates on the éti-cel program for relapsed/refractory non-Hodgkin lymphoma, strategic collaborations, and recent scientific advances. Presenters include CEO André Choulika, SVP Laurent Poirot, and CFO Arthur Stril. The event targets French shareholders and includes a Q&A session.

articles.title: Chongqing's Dazu District in Southwest China to Host Young Scholars for Innovative Grotto Conservation
articles.source: The People's Government of Dazu District, Chongqing
articles.summary: The 2025 international academic exchange activity for young grotto researchers, part of the Asian Alliance for Cultural Heritage Conservation's Youth Ambassador Program, will be held in Dazu District, Chongqing. Over 100 young scholars from multiple countries will engage in innovative approaches to grotto temple conservation, focusing on digital technologies and cultural heritage preservation. The event is co-hosted by several cultural and governmental organizations and aims to foster international cooperation and youth involvement in cultural heritage protection.

articles.title: China's Pengzhou Builds "Pengzhou Lifestyle" as City Identity
articles.summary: From November 20 to 22, 2025, the Global Panda Partners Conference highlighted Pengzhou's innovative integration of culture, tourism, ecology, and urban development, establishing the 'Pengzhou Lifestyle' as a distinctive city identity. Pengzhou was recognized as a top innovative model for cultural and tourism integration, promoting a lifestyle brand supported by unique local resources, signature IPs, and a growing portfolio of outdoor sports and cultural events. articles.title: European Authors Day 2025: #ReadForReal Launches Across Europe
articles.summary: The European Authors Day 2025 celebrations under the slogan #ReadForReal have launched across Europe, co-funded by the EU Creative Europe Programme. The campaign promotes deep reading, literature appreciation, and human connection through live events, author visits, and educational materials. Over 200,000 participants in 25 countries will engage in nearly 3600 initiatives. The Universal Reading Foundation leads the consortium coordinating this continent-wide celebration to raise literacy and critical thinking.

articles.summary: DPM Metals Inc. announced the results of a feasibility study for the Čoka Rakita gold project in Serbia, confirming robust economics with a $782 million NPV at 5% discount and a 36% IRR based on a $1,900/oz gold price. The project features increased mineral reserves and gold production, low costs, and is advancing towards construction start in early 2027 with first concentrate production expected in 2029. The company emphasizes strong local stakeholder engagement and plans to leverage existing processing infrastructure.

articles.title: Omnicom-IPG deal on path to close Wednesday following EU approval
articles.summary: Omnicom Group expects to complete its $13 billion-plus acquisition of Interpublic Group by Wednesday after receiving unconditional approval from the European Union. The merger will create the world's largest marketing services provider amid ongoing agency consolidation. The deal highlights synergies in media, healthcare, and precision marketing, with potential agency brand changes and workforce reductions. The acquisition reflects evolving agency priorities, including AI and data-driven marketing, and follows a Federal Trade Commission consent order on ad spend policies.

articles.title: Uber debuts first national holiday ad as focus on suburbs grows
articles.summary: Uber released its first national holiday ad titled "Close," focusing on a suburban marketing push. The ad tells an emotional father-daughter story set to a cover of Fleetwood Mac's "Landslide," highlighting complicated family relationships during the holidays. Developed with agency Mother and directed by Michael Spiccia, the campaign runs across cinema, connected TV, online video, and social media in the U.S. and Canada. Uber views suburban markets as a significant growth opportunity, especially during heavy holiday travel periods.

articles.title: Value is winning holiday sales as TJX, Ross and Walmart surge, Target tumbles

Sales at off-price retailers like Ross and TJX, parent company to TJ Maxx, Marshalls and Homegoods, soared while spending at Walmart increased and Target tumbled. According to company leaders, TJX sales are driven by lower-income individuals, while Walmart saw its number of wealthy shoppers grow.

outreach_templates.email_subject: Verified Gen Z sampling opportunities for Flirt
outreach_templates.email_body:
Hi Hilton,

We operate a sampling network focused on Gen Z across major college campuses, and we specialize in verified, fraud-free product trial.

Given Monster’s announcement of Flirt, and its positioning toward female consumers, we can support your launch by distributing samples directly to students and verifying every redemption using only the student’s phone number.

Brands only pay on unique, verified redemptions—no duplicates, no recycled samples, and no inflated numbers. There are no upfront fees or placement costs.

If exploring a campus-driven push for Flirt is on your radar, I’d be glad to share how this system works.

Best,
Jonas

outreach_templates.email_subject: Campus sampling ideas for Prime Shrimp’s refreshed brand
outreach_templates.email_body:
Hi Grace,

I saw the recent Food Dive press release about Prime Shrimp’s brand refresh and updated packaging. The positioning around ease, flavor, and getting shrimp into the weekly rotation feels like a strong fit for college students who want something fast but still premium.

We run a sampling network focused on Gen Z across major college campuses. Everything is verified by phone number so each sample is tied to a unique student, and brands only pay on verified redemptions (no duplicates, no recycled samples, no inflated counts).

If you’re interested in testing Prime Shrimp with college students – especially around quick at-home meals and freezer-friendly proteins – I’d be happy to share how we handle distribution, verification, and reporting.

Would you be open to a quick conversation?

Best,
Jonas

I run a Gen Z sampling network across major college campuses where every sample is tied to a verified student phone number, so brands only pay on unique redemptions.
